title: Chef Thomas Keller on Finding Professional Success After 40
sub_head: The chef worked in kitchens for over 20 years before buying The French Laundry—and has a secret hack for ordering In-N-Out fries
body:
In our series My Monday Morning, self-motivated people tell WSJ. how they start off the week.
Chef Thomas Keller has an allergy, but it is not to food. It’s to brainstorming.
